meanings.definition: A person who dislikes or is opposed to new things or change.
meanings.sent1: My grandfather is a misoneist who prefers things to stay the same.
meanings.sent2: The misoneist refused to try the new technology, sticking to his old ways.
meanings.sent3: The misoneist grumbled about the new restaurant in town, wishing for the familiar diner instead.
meanings.sent4: Her misoneist nature made her hesitant to embrace the evolving trends of the modern world.
meanings.sent5: The misoneist's fear of change kept him isolated from the exciting opportunities around him.
